sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import './userDetails.css'; // Import CSS file import { Button, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardTitle, Row, CardFooter, Label, Form, FormGroup, Input, Col, Alert } from "reactstrap"; const CustomerDetailsForm = () => { // State for location const [latitude, setLatitude] = useState(''); const [longitude, setLongitude] = useState(''); const [accuracy, setAccuracy] = useState(''); // State for captured images const [selfieCaptured, setSelfieCaptured] = useState(false); const [shopPhotoCaptured, setShopPhotoCaptured] = useState(false); // State for form fields const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ first_name: '', last_name: '', guardian_name: '', relation_with_guardian: '', guardian_occupation: '', dob: '', pan_number: '', mobile: '', email: '', gender: '', occupation_category: '', other_occupation: '', business_type: '', monthly_income: '', loan_amount: '', loan_category: '', employment_type: '', salary_received_type: '', company_name: '', type_of_loan: '', shop_type: '', education_level: '', insurance: '', shop_road_type: '', home_address: '', home_city: '', home_state: '', home_pincode: '', business_address: '', business_city: '', business_state: '', business_pincode: '' }); useEffect(() => { // Fetch user's geolocation navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition( (position) => { setLatitude(position.coords.latitude); setLongitude(position.coords.longitude); setAccuracy(position.coords.accuracy); }, (error) => { console.error('Error getting user location:', error); } ); }, []); // Empty dependency array ensures effect runs only once // Handle capturing selfie or shop photo const capturePhoto = (type) => { // Implement capturing logic if (type === 'selfie') { // Capture selfie logic setSelfieCaptured(true); } else if (type === 'shop') { // Capture shop photo logic setShopPhotoCaptured(true); } }; // Handle form field changes const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }); }; // Handle form submission const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Implement form submission logic console.log('Form submitted with data:', formData); }; return (
Loan Application Request Form {/* */} {/* Add form fields */}
{/* Include options for home states */} {/* */} {/* */} {/* Include options for business states */} {/* Add other form fields similarly */} {/* */}

Terms and Conditions

We would like to inform you that the following information has been provided by you as per your discussion with Tide (Tide Platform Private Limited) regarding your loan request. Your information will be shared with their partner Happy and its lending institution, subject to approval. The lending institution will get in touch with you to meet your requirements. We prioritize your privacy and are committed to safeguarding your information. Rest assured, we will only use your details to assess your loan eligibility. Please provide accurate details to ensure the efficient processing of your loan application. By proceeding, you hereby give your consent to share this information.
); }; export default CustomerDetailsForm;
